about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of gripping horror as you embark on a journey to survive seven nights in a sinister apartment, trapped by your own dependencies and fears. Be prepared for constant tension as each night brings new trials: you must stay awake with the help of coffee, or face the dark abyss of inactivity; ensure your mining farm operates smoothly to maintain electricity in the apartment; but remember, you are not alone - malevolent forces lurk in the darkness, ready to disrupt your tranquility. Fearlessly explore the dark corners of the apartment, but tread carefully: every move could lead to deadly consequences. Will you hold out until dawn, or will your own demons ultimately consume you?

short_description: Experience seven nights in the apartment, being dependent on coffee, prepare for power outages, make sure the mining farm doesn't break down, exercise caution in the darkness. You won't be alone for sure!
